item.title: Recipe: Cinnamon Daliya
item.description: ~2 servings Into a pot on stove: 1 tablespoon butter 0.5 cup daliya (cracked wheat) Stir constantly. When browned: 1.25 cup water 2.11 cup (0.5 liter) milk Stir constantly. When reduced and daliya is cooked: 1 teaspoon daalchini (cinnamon) powder ??? honey ??? sliced almonds

item.title: Recipe: Chole
item.description: ~5 servings. Into a pot on stove: 3 cups white chickpeas soaked overnight ??? cups water 3 inch cinnamon stick 15 cardamom pods (elaichi) 1.5 bay leaf 1.5 teaspoon ginger paste 0.5 teaspoon baking soda 1.5 teaspoon salt After chickpeas cooked al dente: Strain out water and save it Remove cinnamon, cardamom pods, bay leaves from chickpeas Into a large pan on stove: 6 tablespoon oil When hot: 1.5 large onion chopped

item.title: Recipe: Tadka
item.description: Into a pan on stove: 1 tablespoon Olive Oil When warm: 1/2 teaspoon Cumin seeds (jira) When brown: 1 cups diced Onion 2" piece of root of Ginger (adrak), diced When brown: 0.5 cups diced Tomato ??? Chilli Pepper Lower temp, then: 2 teaspoon coriander powder (dhaniya) 1/2 teaspoon garam masaala 2 teaspoon cayenne (laal mirch) 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon turmeric (haldi) Acid (lemon/lime juice) Higher temp and mix. Add water if too dry.
